browser_cleaner.bat.description: Deep clean browser history, cache, cookies, bookmarks, and extensions

context_menu_cleaner.bat.description: Remove clutter from right-click context menu

empty_folder_cleaner.bat.description: Remove empty folders from user profile

system_cleanup.bat.description: Clean temp files, cache, and system junk

game_optimizer.bat.description: Optimize system for maximum gaming performance with NVIDIA tweaks

privacy_tweaker.bat.description: Disable Windows telemetry, tracking, and data collection

windows_debloater.bat.description: Remove Windows bloatware and disable unwanted features

dns_changer.bat.description: Quick switch DNS (Google, Cloudflare, OpenDNS, Quad9, AdGuard)

ip_information.bat.description: Display network info, IP addresses, gateway, DNS, and connections

network_diagnostics.bat.description: Diagnose and fix network connectivity issues

open_to_bios.bat.description: Restart computer directly into BIOS/UEFI settings

registry_backup.bat.description: Backup Windows registry and create system restore point

ssd_optimizer.bat.description: Optimize SSD with TRIM, disable defrag, improve lifespan

font_cache_rebuild.bat.description: Fix font rendering issues by rebuilding font cache

icon_cache_rebuild.bat.description: Fix corrupted desktop icons by rebuilding icon cache

search_rebuild.bat.description: Fix Windows Search not working by rebuilding search index

store_reset.bat.description: Fix Microsoft Store download issues by resetting Store

temp_cleaner.bat.description: Clean all temporary files, prefetch, and thumbnail cache

empty_downloads.bat.description: Clean Downloads folder with options for all files or by age

network_reset.bat.description: Complete network reset: TCP/IP, DNS, Winsock, and firewall

speed_test.bat.description: Test internet download speed and latency

mac_address_changer.bat.description: Change or reset MAC address (random or custom)

path_cleaner.bat.description: Remove duplicate and invalid entries from PATH variable

prevent_sleep.bat.description: Prevent computer from sleeping (indefinitely or timed)

windows_defender_toggle.bat.description: Enable or disable Windows Defender protection features

portable_antivirus.bat.description: Portable Security Suite: Dr.Web and RKill (Anti-Malware)

privacy_suite.bat.description: Portable Privacy Suite: O&O ShutUp10++ and WPD (Telemtry/Firewall)

uninstaller_suite.bat.description: Portable Uninstaller Suite: Geek Uninstaller and Revo (Clean Removal)

numlock_auto_on.bat.description: Force NumLock to be ON at Windows startup
